onyomiExamples.meaning: heart-to-heart communication, thought transference, holding a flower and subtly smiling
managing (to raise funds, find time, etc.), contriving, scraping together (money), working out (a plan, solution, etc.), thinking out, devising, contriving

kunyomiExamples.meaning: to twist, to wrench, to turn (a switch on or off, etc.), to wring (a neck), to puzzle over, to defeat easily
